description: Course instances enrollments with a minimum modified instance question count.

params.name: institution_short_name
params.description: Restrict to a particular institution (blank means all institutions).

params.name: start_date
params.description: Lower bound on instance question modification timestamps.

params.name: end_date
params.description: Upper bound on instance question modification timestamps.

params.name: minimum_instance_question_count
params.description: Minimum number of modified instance questions for an enrollment to be included.

params.name: minimum_enrollment_count
params.description: Minimum number of enrollments for a course instance to be included.
